feed.title: Sherlock Holmes
feed.subtitle: Although better known for my detective skills, my true passion is writing death metal songs. This website is my blog I use to verbalize my musical journey. Any bugs or issues with the website are purposeful and meant as a challenge for you to use your detective skills.

entry.title: New Album “Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood”

link.title: New Album "Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood"

entry.content: My new album, “Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood” has been a long time coming. It captures an emotion I experience a lot with my day job and I hope the music transmits that experience to you. It has been a long jouney but I am really glad that all of my loyal fans can hear it.
entry.summary: My new album, “Wow That Is A Lot Of Blood” has been a long time coming. It captures an emotion I experience a lot with my day job and I hope the music transmits that experience to you. It has been a long jouney but I am really glad that all of my loyal fans can hear it.

entry.title: Great Show at the Royal Intellectual Society in London

link.title: Great Show at the Royal Intellectual Society in London

entry.content: Really had a great time last night performing at the Royal Intellectual Society in London. Thanks to everyone who came out to see the show. The crowd was truly electric. A special thanks to the Duke of Wellington and the Prince of Whales for inciting a riot in the mosh pit, it really livened up the performance. I can’t wait to see all of you at my next show, at the Royal Geographical Society in a month.
entry.summary: Really had a great time last night performing at the Royal Intellectual Society in London. Thanks to everyone who came out to see the show. The crowd was truly electric. A special thanks to the Duke of Wellington and the Prince of Whales for inciting a riot in the mosh pit, it really livened up the performance. I can’t wait to see all of you at my next show, at the Royal Geographical Society in a month.

entry.title: New Single “Surrounded By Murderers”
entry.content: I wanted to announce that my new single, “Surrounded by Murderers” is coming out tomorrow night. The idea for this track came to me at work a few months ago and I could not get it out of my head. It really combines a lot of my feelings at this point in my life.
entry.summary: I wanted to announce that my new single, “Surrounded by Murderers” is coming out tomorrow night. The idea for this track came to me at work a few months ago and I could not get it out of my head. It really combines a lot of my feelings at this point in my life.
